000158.SZ.long_name: Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd
000158.SZ.summary: Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells textile products in China. The company offers yarns, fabrics, clothing products, home textiles, and industrial textiles. It also operates a cloud data center; provides consulting, implementation, operation, and maintenance services for smart cities; and operates an online dispute resolution platform for resolving social contradictions. The company was formerly known as Shijiazhuang Changshan Textile Company Limited and changed its name to Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd in October 2017. Shijiazhuang ChangShan BeiMing Technology Co., Ltd is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

000301.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Eastern Shenghong Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of civilian polyester fiber related products. It also engages in the production and supply of thermoelectric power. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

000813.SZ.summary: Dezhan Healthcare Company Limited researches and develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical products for cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases. The company is based in Beijing, China.

000850.SZ.summary: Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. produces and sells textile products primarily in China. Its products include cotton and polyester yarns, fabrics, and threads. The company offers its products under the Anhui, Chengfeng, and Silver Wave, brands. Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. is based in Anqing, China.

000955.SZ.summary: Xinglong Holding (Group) Company Ltd. produces and sells nonwoven products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers spun laced nonwovens, including sanitary, industrial cleaning, filtering, medical dressing, medical protective, daily cleaning, beauty and skin care, automobile, decorative, apparel interlining, and other materials; and melt blown nonwovens, such as air filtering, respiratory protective, liquid filtering, and oil absorbing materials, as well as wipes. It also provides PET spun bonded nonwovens comprising packaging, filtering, automobile, home decoration and coating compound, building, geotechnical, agricultural and gardening, printing, cable wrapping, and industrial materials; and SMMMXS nonwovens consisting of medical care, personal hygiene, healthcare, and other products. In addition, the company offers nonwoven converted products; agricultural and chemical products, which comprise feed grade dicalcium phosphate, refined humid phosphoric acid, and other refined phosphate products, as well as industrial, agricultural, and feed grade potassium dihydrogen phosphate; and TX spunlace wipes. It also exports its products to Europe, North America, India, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Xinglong Holding (Group) Company Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Haikou, the People's Republic of China.

000982.SZ.summary: Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and exports cashmere products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers woolen cashmere, worsted cashmere, linen, and special yarns; and woven cashmere, woven wool, knitted linen, woven linen, and woven blended fabrics. It also provides various garments, such as cashmere knitted, cashmere/wool knitted, and linen and blended knitwear garments; cashmere/PVA worsted and napping cashmere scarves and shawls; cashmere pilled-in selvedge fulling scarves; and woven blankets. The company offers its products under the Todd & Duncan, Brown Allan, and Philosofie brand names. In addition, it operates clothing stores and e-business Websites. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Lingwu, the People's Republic of China. Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Lingwu Zhongyin Cashmere Company Ltd.

002042.SZ.summary: Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies yarn products in China. The company offers mÃ©lange yarn, which is used in underwear textiles, casual wear, sportswear, shirts, business suites, socks, and various cloth products, as well as bed linens, towels, decorative fabrics, and other home fabric products. Its mÃ©lange yarns are also used in weft knitting, flat bed knitting, and weaving machines. The company also provides semi-worsted, vortex spun, and rotor spun color yarn products; and grey and dyed yarn products, as well as auxiliary products; and inferior yarn, cotton waste, and waste materials. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Japan, the Republic of Korea, and Southeast Asia. The company was formerly known as Huafu Top Dyed Melange Yarn Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Huafu Fashion Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002072.SZ.summary: Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. produces and distributes textile products. It provides fabric and yarn products, including loom stare, yarn-dyed and cotton fabrics, and others. The company was formerly known as Shandong Demian Incorporated Company and changed its name to Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Kairuide Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Dezhou, China.

002083.SZ.summary: Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells home textile products primarily in China. Its home textile products comprise towels, bedding and decorative articles, and furnishing fabrics. The company exports its products to Asia, Europe, the United States, and Australia, as well as to various countries and regions, including the Middle East and South Africa under the Sunvim brand. It also provides real estate services; supplies gas to approximately 300 industrial users, as well as centralized heating for residents and public facilities in Gaomi; and produces, sells, and services water for industrial and human consumption. In addition, the company operates an online shop. Sunvim Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Gaomi, China.

002087.SZ.summary: Henan Xinye Textile Co., Ltd. produces and sells fabric yarns and apparel fabrics in China. Its products include pure cotton and blended yarns and fabrics, yarn dyed fabrics, and home textiles. The company also exports its products to 12 countries and regions, such as the United States, the European Union, Japan, South Korea, and Hong Kong. Henan Xinye Textile Co., Ltd. is based in Xinyang, China.

002144.SZ.summary: Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. engages in warp-knitting, medical device, trading, and financial investment businesses in China. The company offers automotive interior decorative, lingerie, swimwear elastic, and sports and leisure fabrics. It also provides home textile fabrics for manufacturing curtains, sofas, and beddings. In addition, the company manufactures and retails medical devices for diagnosing the problems of liver, gallbladder, spleen, kidney, pancreas, heart, thyroid, breast, bladder, etc. Further, it exports its automotive interior fabrics to the United States, Germany, Japan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Hongda Warp Knitting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. in August 2010. Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Haining, China.

002193.SZ.long_name: Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd.
002193.SZ.summary: Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells worsted woolen fabrics and garments in China, Germany, and internationally. It offers professional clothing, and uniforms; functional wool fabrics for use in various clothing characteristics, such as anti-UV, anti-static, waterproof, oil-proof, anti-fouling, cool, moisture-permeable, heat-storing, machine washable, flame-retardant, and illuminating protection; and ecological wool fabrics. The company was formerly known as Shandong Jining Ruyi Woolen Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002201.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co., Ltd.
002201.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co.,Ltd. produces and sells glass fiber yarn, fabrics, and FRP products in China. Its fiberglass products include building materials, such as EIFS and wall reinforcement, roofing waterproof, and stone reinforcement products; continuous filament mat; knitted fabrics for chopped strands mats and veil; woven roving for boats body, sports mechanics, military, automotive, etc.; fiberglass joint tapes; fiberglass alkaline-resistant mesh; and roving for wind turbine blades, high-pressure pipes, pressure cylinders, pultrusion, filament winding, and weaving applications. The company also offers e-glass fiber grinding wheel reinforced mesh, e-glass fiber wheel reinforced mesh, e-glass fiberglass yarns and rovings, e-glass fiber cloth, aluminum water filter base fabric, and high silica mesh and fabric for insulation, corrosion resistance, heat resistance, reinforcement, and other use. In addition, it provides pultrusion profile, a composite material for cooling tower, infrastructure, electricity insulation, chemical industry, and industrial and consumer goods applications; grille, a structural plate; and chemical environment protection equipment. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries, including North America, Europe, Southeast Asia, Japan, and South Korea. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Jiuding Group. Jiangsu Jiuding New Material Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Rugao, China.

002293.SZ.summary: Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, markets, and sells home textiles. The company offers sofas, dining tables, picture frames, and jewelry for living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, and other household space; bedding, toys, home life supplies, furnishings, and other ancillary products; lace products; towels, bathrobes, home wear, and bath supplies; and fragrance products. It also provides four piece sets, fillings, products for babies and kids, home clothes, toiletries, smart home products, and other products through Dapu.com. The company offers its products under the Luolai Home, LOVO, Luolai Kids, Lavie Home, Yolanna, Sheridan, Uchino, Zucchi, Millefiori, LAVIE PARFUMS, Bassetti, and Lexington brands. It operates approximately 3,000 stores in China. The company was formerly known as Luolai Home Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Luolai Lifestyle Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002327.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd.
002327.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes home textile products in China and internationally. It offers home furnishing accessories, such as cushions, towels, and blankets; female home furnishing products, including home dresses, home bags, and silk scarves; and customized lady dresses. The company offers its products under the Fu Anna, Visha, Xin and Le, Cool Chizhi, Shengzhihua, and Fuannameijia brands. Shenzhen Fuanna Bedding and Furnishing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002394.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the textile business in China. It is involved in yarn spinning, dyeing, weaving, finishing, and printing activities. The company offers fabric products, such as long-staple length cotton fabrics, texture fabrics, natural fabrics, and functional finishing fabrics; garments, including men's formal and casual shirts, and women's formal shirts and casual wear; and yarn products. It also supplies steam and compressed air; and engages in the thermal power generation, trading, logistics, and water treatment activities. The company exports its products to 36 countries, including Japan, the United States, Europe, and South East Asia. Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

002397.SZ.summary: Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells home textiles products in China and internationally. It offers suites, blankets, and pillows. The name was formerly known as Changsha Mengjie Quilted Products Industry Co., Ltd and its changed name to Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd in January 2001. Hunan Mendale Hometextile Co.,Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Changsha, China.

002427.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Unifull Industrial Fibre Co., Ltd.
002427.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Unifull Industrial Fibre Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial polyester yarns, dipped tire cord fabrics, dipped conveyor belt fabrics, and dipped cords in China and internationally. The company also offers cord fabrics, cords, and canvas products; and lithium batteries and hydrogen fuel systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Huzhou, China.

002486.SZ.summary: Shanghai Challenge Textile Co., Ltd. provides fabrics for men and women. It offers crafted, outdoor, and travel fabrics. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

002674.SZ.summary: Xingye Leather Technology Co., Ltd. provides shoe leather materials in China. The company offers napa, natural wrestling, and special effects series products. Its products are used in leather shoes, luggage, leather goods, leather furniture, and other manufacturing applications. Xingye Leather Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Jinjiang, China.

002761.SZ.summary: Dohia Group Co., Ltd engages in the construction of municipal infrastructures. It also offers construction engineering, machinery equipment leasing, highway engineering, water conservancy, architectural decoration, and urban rail transit development services. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002763.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Huijie Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells underwear in China. The company also provides swimwear and accessories. It offers underwear products for men, women, and chidren under the Mannifen, Ives, Lan Zhuoli, Plus One Shangpin, Qiao Baishi, Body Beauty, Secret Weapon, and Mr. Potato brands. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Manni Fen Knitwear Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Huijie Group Co., Ltd. in July 2011. Shenzhen Huijie Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002875.SZ.summary: Annil Co.,Ltd engages in the mid-to-high-end casual children's wear business under the Annil Annai brand in China. It focuses on clothing products for boys and girls of 0-12 years; 1-3 years child products; and 0-1 year baby boy products. The company also provides home services for 0-12 year children products. It serves customers through stores, as well as online stores comprising Tmall, Vipshop, and Micro mall. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

0528.HK.summary: Kingdom Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells linen yarns in Mainland China, the European Union, and internationally. Its products include wet spun and organic linen yarns, linen yarn for knitting, and PEONY series products, as well as single dyeing function linen yarn. The company offers its linen yarns under the Ziwei Crape Myrtle and KINGDOM brands. In addition, it engages in trading activities; and processes agriculture products. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions. Kingdom Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Haiyan, China.

1400.HK.summary: Moody Technology Holdings Limited produces and sells fabrics and yarns primarily in Mainland China. It operates in two segments, Sales of Fabrics and Sales of Shoes and Clothes. It sells grey and dyed garment fabrics; and shoes and clothes. The company also exports its products. In addition, it engages in the artificial intelligence business. The company was formerly known as Wang Tai Holdings Limited and changed its name to Moody Technology Holdings Limited in August 2018. Moody Technology Holdings Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shishi, the People's Republic of China.

1968.HK.summary: Hingtex Holdings Limited designs, manufactures, and sells denim fabrics. It offers non-stretchable, stretchable cotton, and stretchable blended denim fabrics. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China.

2698.HK.summary: Weiqiao Textile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells cotton yarns, grey fabrics, and denims primarily in Mainland China, Hong Kong, East Asia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, and internationally. It operates through Textile Products, and Electricity and Steam segments. The company's products include carded, combed, compact, and open-ended spun cotton yarns; grey fabrics, such as plain fabrics, twill weave fabrics, tribute silk series, jacquard series, and khaki drills; and cotton, cotton spandex elasticity, cotton dacron elasticity, cotton and bamboo blend, bamboo joint, cotton regenerated cellulose fibers blend, and other denims. It also produces and sells polyester yarn and related products; and trades in textile raw materials and products. In addition, the company is involved in the generation and sale of electricity and steam businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it had an installed capacity of 2,760 megawatts of thermal power assets. The company is based in Zouping, the People's Republic of China. Weiqiao Textile Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shandong Weiqiao Chuangye Group Company Limited.

300819.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300819.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of microfiber fabrics, clothing, and textile products in China. It offers superfine fiber leather fabrics; hygroscopic fast drying, velvet, and cool type fabrics; dustless wipe clothes, clean cotton swabs, car wiping papers, oblique and straight type piece suits, and family portraits; and microfiber bathrobe, swimwear, sports towel, beach towel, sports clothing, bedspread, sofa cover, and textile products. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Southeast Asia, and other countries. Jiangsu Jujie Microfiber Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wujiang, China.

300877.SZ.summary: Anhui Jinchun Nonwoven Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textile products. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Cangzhou, China.

300918.SZ.summary: Shandong Nanshan Zhishang Sci-Tech Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells worsted compact fabrics in China and internationally. The company also offers business wear. It sells its products under the Nanshan, Dellma, PAUL BETENLY, Bosa Magine, and Mens Planet brands. The company is based in Yantai, China.

3778.HK.summary: China Weaving Materials Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing and trading of yarn products and related raw materials in the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Yarns and Staple Fibres. The company offers cotton, polyester, polyester-cotton and viscose-cotton blended, viscose, and mÃ©lange and mÃ©lange-cotton blended yarns, as well as polyester staple fibers. China Weaving Materials Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Yichun, the People's Republic of China.

600070.SS.long_name: Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
600070.SS.summary: Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the textiles business in China. The company offers silk and wool; decorative and knitted fabrics; and knitted and woven garments. It is also involved in the silk printing and dyeing; steel pipe processing and production; and commerce businesses. In addition, the company engages in the development and application of the Internet and big data. Further, it offers pet supplies; and invests in financial, construction materials, film and television, utilization of high-valued waste textiles, real estate, aged care services, ecological agriculture, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Furun CO.,LTD. and changed its name to Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2020. Zhejiang Furun Digital Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Zhuji, China.

600156.SS.summary: Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd produces and sells ramie/linen textiles and garments in China. The company provides ramie yarns and clothing products. It also produces and sells pharmaceutical machinery and equipment. The company also exports its products to the European Union, the United States, Japan, South Korea, South America, and other countries and regions. Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Changsha, China.

600295.SS.summary: Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. engages in garment, energy, chemical, metallurgy, and other businesses in China. The company provides plush products, cashmere yarns, cashmere sweaters, and other seasonal products. It also offers ferrosilicon, silicon manganese alloy, coal, caustic soda, calcium carbide, and PVC resins. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Eerduosi Resources Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. in June 2011. Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Ordos, China.

600346.SS.summary: Hengli Petrochemical Co.,Ltd. engages in the petrochemical business. It produces and sells petroleum and intermediate petrochemical products, as well as synthetic fibers. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Dalian, China.

600370.SS.summary: Jiangsu Sanfangxiang Industry Co., Ltd engages in the chemical fiber, textiles, printed and dyed fabrics, and chemical businesses. Its products include canvas materials, chemical fibers, plastic engineering parts, and tarpaulins and canvas products, as well as corduroy, cotton and linen blended, nylon, plain cotton, poplin, printed cotton, ramie, rayon, satin/satinette, stretch, twill, and woven fabrics; and industrial used plastics/polymers/resins. Jiangsu Sanfangxiang Industry Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

600448.SS.summary: Huafang Co., Ltd. operates in the textile printing and dyeing industry in China and internationally. It offers home textiles, fabrics, bedding, clothing, blue platinum, and fiber series products. The company is also involved in the thermal power, real estate, financial, and information service businesses. Huafang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Binzhou, China.

600493.SS.long_name: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
600493.SS.summary: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production, dyeing, finishing, and sale of knitted fabrics and tube dyed yarns primarily in China. The company offers member products; imitation cotton, segment-color yarn, mercerized cotton, CDP, pique, ordinary, and functional series dyeing products; printing series products; and stripes terry toweling products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jinjiang, China.

600510.SS.summary: Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and textile businesses in China and internationally. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of denim fabric, yarn-dyed-fabrics, khaki, corduroy, and other casual wear; and real estate development business. In addition, the company imports and exports various goods, industrial products, textiles, labor supplies, household goods, department store products, hardware products, electrical goods, and decoration materials. It also exports its textile products to the United States, Japan, Russia, Hong Kong, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Changzhou Second Sezhi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. in March 1995. The company was founded in 1940 and is based in Changzhou, China. Black Peony (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Changzhou Hi-tech Group Co., Ltd.

600626.SS.summary: Shanghai Shenda Co., Ltd engages in the import and export trading of textile products in China. It is involved in the design, research and development, production organization, quality control, custom, and commodity inspection fund of upstream customers. The company also offers automotive blanks, molding blankets, ceiling fabrics, seat fabrics, safety belts, etc. In addition, it provides biogas and architectural membrane structures, waterproof membranes, inflatable materials, and car covers. Further, the company engages in the park development, house leasing, and property management activities. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600689.SS.summary: Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. imports business apparel, wool fabrics, auto parts, and other products in China and internationally. The company invests in, leases, develops, and manages real estate properties; and provides network information technology related products and services, etc. It also offers security equipment, such as user monitoring and anti- theft reported to the police, as well as access control installation and maintenance, repair, and other services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Sanmao Textile Co., Ltd. Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600987.SS.summary: Zhejiang Hangmin Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells textiles in China. The company also engages in the printing and dyeing of related raw materials; thermoelectric production; shipping; and weaving, logistics, and sewage treatment activities. In addition, it offers non-woven fabrics, fiber blended fabrics, facsimile fabrics, printed fabrics, etc. The company exports its products to Southeast Asia, the Middle East, North America, the European Union, Hong Kong, Macao, and internationally. Zhejiang Hangmin Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

601113.SS.summary: Yiwu Huading Nylon Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, and manufactures nylon filaments primarily in China. The company offers nylon 6 POY, DTY, HOY, and FDY products; coolnylon, a moisture absorbed and perspiration nylon-6 fiber; and cleannylon, an anti-bacterial nylon-6 fiber. Its products are used for socks, cotton socks, elastic knitting coats, light-weight seamless underwear, swimsuit, sportswear, suits, denim, suit lining, etc., as well as work as dust coats, jackets, uniforms, sportswear, snow pants, umbrella surface silk, curtains, sofa fabrics, adornments, etc. The company also exports its products to Western Europe, the Americas, the Middle East, and other countries and regions. Yiwu Huading Nylon Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Yiwu, China.

601233.SS.summary: Tongkun Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells polyester filament yarns in China. The company offers various polyester filament yarns, including polyester pre-oriented, low spamdexed, full draw, and composite yarns; spandex covered yarns; two-component elastic yarns; polybutylene terephthalate matte high elastic yarns; medium-strength polyester yarn as high-performance sewing threads; imitated hemp yarns; blanket plush yarns; and cationic modified polyester under the GOLDENCOCK and Tongkun brand names. It also exports its products to South America, Europe, the Middle East, South Africa, South Korea, and Vietnam. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Tongxiang, China.

601599.SS.summary: Zhewen Pictures Group co.,ltd produces and sells yarns in China. The company offers worsted, half fine spinning, fancy, and coarse yarns; semi-worsted products; woolen products; worsted fabrics; formal suits; and business suits and shirts. It provides its products under the SINFONIA, ARMONIA, REGAL, LANIFICIO LA MALPENGA, and PALLADIO brand names. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

603055.SS.long_name: Zhe Jiang Taihua New Material Co., Ltd.
603055.SS.summary: Zhe Jiang Taihua New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, spinning, weaving, dyeing, and finishing of environmental protection and health, outdoor sports, special protection, and other functional fabrics in China. It offers cool, antibacterial, hygroscopic and sweat releasing, recycled environment-friendly, nylon mechanical stretch, air textured, and dope dyed yarns. The company also exports its products worldwide. Zhe Jiang Taihua New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jiaxing, China.

603238.SS.summary: HangZhou Nbond Nonwovens Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells spunlace nonwovens materials in China and internationally. The company's spunlace nonwovens products cover various series and specifications, including beauty care materials, industrial materials, household wiping materials, medical materials, and various series of products for other fields and purposes. It also offers wet wipes, industrial wipes, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

603332.SS.long_name: Suzhou Longjie Special Fiber Co., Ltd.
603332.SS.summary: Suzhou Longjie Special Fiber Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of various polyester filaments in China and internationally. Its products primary include FDY and DTY island composite fiber; DTY eco-friendly three-dimensional composite colored fiber; FDY flat filament series products; monocomponent potential controllable crimpled fiber; and PTT fiber, as well as various polyester industrial filaments, such as high strength type, high strength low contraction type, high strength abrasion-proof type, activated type, anti-wicking type, fine-denier type, etc. The company is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

603365.SS.long_name: Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co., Ltd.
603365.SS.summary: Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of home textiles in China and internationally. It offers bedspreads, quilts, pillows, single-piece combinations, cushions, children's products, summer supplies, blankets, and others. The company sells its products through specialty stores and mall counters in China. Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Shanghai, China.

603889.SS.summary: Zhejiang Xinao Textiles Inc. researches and develops, produces, and sells worsted yarn and intermediate products of wool tops in China. Its products are primarily used in the downstream textile apparel brands. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Xinao textiles Group Company LTD. and changed its name to Zhejiang Xinao Textiles Inc. in December 2007. Zhejiang Xinao Textiles Inc. was founded in 1991 and is based in Tongxiang City, China.

605006.SS.summary: Shandong Fiberglass Group Co., Ltd manufactures and sells glass fiber yarn and other fiberglass products in China. Its products include C and E glass yarn, roving, wallcoverings, insect screens, and various industrial fabrics. The company is based in Linyi, China.

605055.SS.summary: Zhejiang Yingfeng Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the printing and dyeing of textiles in China. It offers printing and dyeing services for knitted fabrics and woven fabrics. The company is based in Shaoxing, China.

8607.HK.summary: Narnia (Hong Kong) Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells fabrics in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company primarily offers brushed fabric, decorative fabric, imitation silk, sateen, pongee, polyester shirt fabric, taffeta, bed fabric, washed cashmere, oxford fabric, and imitation printed cotton products. It is also involved in the provision of printing and dyeing services; and textile manufacturing activities. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China. Narnia (Hong Kong) Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Spring Sea Star Investment Limited.

900922.SS.summary: Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. imports business apparel, wool fabrics, auto parts, and other products in China and internationally. The company invests in, leases, develops, and manages real estate properties; and provides network information technology related products and services, etc. It also offers security equipment, such as user monitoring and anti- theft reported to the police, as well as access control installation and maintenance, repair, and other services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Sanmao Textile Co., Ltd. Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

900936.SS.summary: Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. engages in garment, energy, chemical, metallurgy, and other businesses in China. The company provides plush products, cashmere yarns, cashmere sweaters, and other seasonal products. It also offers ferrosilicon, silicon manganese alloy, coal, caustic soda, calcium carbide, and PVC resins. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Eerduosi Resources Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. in June 2011. Inner Mongolia Erdos Resources Co.,ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Ordos, China.

K7A.F.summary: Kingdom Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells linen yarns in Mainland China, the European Union, and internationally. Its products include wet spun and organic linen yarns, linen yarn for knitting, and PEONY series products, as well as single dyeing function linen yarn. The company offers its linen yarns under the Ziwei Crape Myrtle and KINGDOM brands. In addition, it engages in trading activities; and processes agriculture products. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions. Kingdom Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Haiyan, China.

LZENF.summary: Lizhan Environmental Corporation, through its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, marketing, and export of synthetic leather and other fabrics from leather scrap products and other materials in the People's Republic of China. It offers various synthetic leather fabric products, including ultrasuede products, recycled leather flocked fabrics, microfiber towel fabrics, tufted fabrics, and colgre products, as well as other fabrics consisting of flocking powder, suede fabrics, short hair velvets, and beehive punched cotton. The company is also involved in research and development related to the production of synthetic leather. Its products are used in various consumer applications, including residential and office furniture, garments, and automotive upholstery products. The company sells its products primarily to furniture manufacturers, as well as to fabric distributors. It exports its products to the United States, Nicaragua, Germany, Belgium, France, and South Korea. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tongxiang, the People's Republic of China.

NWQ.F.summary: Best Pacific International Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, trades in, and sells lingerie materials. The company offers elastic fabrics, elastic webbing, lace, and other products for use in the production of lingerie, as well as sportswear, such as sports bras, cycling outfits, running and yoga outfits, and casual apparel; and shoulder straps, lingerie trims, and waistbands. It sells its products to lingerie and sportswear brand owners and manufacturers in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Sri Lanka, Vietnam, Taiwan, South Korea, Europe, the United States, Thailand, Indonesia, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China. Best Pacific International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Grandview Capital Investment Limited.

WEZ.F.summary: Weiqiao Textile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells cotton yarns, grey fabrics, and denims primarily in Mainland China, Hong Kong, East Asia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, and internationally. It operates through Textile Products, and Electricity and Steam segments. The company's products include carded, combed, compact, and open-ended spun cotton yarns; grey fabrics, such as plain fabrics, twill weave fabrics, tribute silk series, jacquard series, and khaki drills; and cotton, cotton spandex elasticity, cotton dacron elasticity, cotton and bamboo blend, bamboo joint, cotton regenerated cellulose fibers blend, and other denims. It also produces and sells polyester yarn and related products; and trades in textile raw materials and products. In addition, the company is involved in the generation and sale of electricity and steam businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it had an installed capacity of 2,760 megawatts of thermal power assets. The company is based in Zouping, the People's Republic of China. Weiqiao Textile Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shandong Weiqiao Chuangye Group Company Limited.

WQTEF.summary: Weiqiao Textile Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells cotton yarns, grey fabrics, and denims primarily in Mainland China, Hong Kong, East Asia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, and internationally. It operates through Textile Products, and Electricity and Steam segments. The company's products include carded, combed, compact, and open-ended spun cotton yarns; grey fabrics, such as plain fabrics, twill weave fabrics, tribute silk series, jacquard series, and khaki drills; and cotton, cotton spandex elasticity, cotton dacron elasticity, cotton and bamboo blend, bamboo joint, cotton regenerated cellulose fibers blend, and other denims. It also produces and sells polyester yarn and related products; and trades in textile raw materials and products. In addition, the company is involved in the generation and sale of electricity and steam businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it had an installed capacity of 2,760 megawatts of thermal power assets. The company is based in Zouping, the People's Republic of China. Weiqiao Textile Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shandong Weiqiao Chuangye Group Company Limited.
